body:
Hi! My name is _Huzuni and I just started playing Avicus, but have got used to the commands quite quickly from playing on other servers.  

Some things about me: 

Favourite color is Red 
I'm a PvPer 
I play on OCN every once in a while 
I'm pretty friendly, so feel free to approach me in-game 

and if you have any questions feel free to ask
